description: Ivankov spins very quickly and creates reflections of his head all around him. This technique is used as a distraction or setup move for his more powerful attacks.
firstUseContext: Used against Kuma during the Marineford War after learning of his complete transformation.

description: After using Ganmen Spectrum, Ivankov unleashes numerous Death Winks from all directions onto his target. Similar to Death Wink and Hell Wink, Ivankov uses his trained eyelids to hit opponents with pressure waves from his eyelashes, but he rapidly shakes his head via Ganmen Spectrum and winks in quick succession to create a barrage effect.
firstUseContext: Used against Bartholomew Kuma at Marineford, managing to damage him somewhat despite his hardened cyborg body.

description: A powerful tackle where Jozu rushes towards an enemy at high speed and slams the person with his diamond-transformed forearm, dealing damage and launching the target a fair distance back. The attack can be enhanced with Armament Haki.
firstUseContext: Used against Crocodile when he was attempting to reach Whitebeard, launching Crocodile toward Doflamingo.
